title: Gold 5 ADC looking for Support! (PLEASE READ EVERYTHING)
body:
Hey Summoners,
Im Leo 23 years old and main ADC, im looking for someone to be my permanent Duo partner as I just enjoy playing botlane with communication and a fun partner. 

**Though I do have some criteria I would like you to fullfill:
**
1.  Be 18 years old or older!
2. Speak good English
3. Have Discord
4. Enjoy playing support
5. (kinda) Fit in with my playstyle : I like playing scaling adc's so I'd prefer you to play peeling Supports (list of my prefered adc's below)
6. Be calm, I can sometimes get to excited and agressiv (gameplay wise) and appreciate someone to tell me to back off if needed
7. Dont be toxic!
8. Play serious and to win!
9. Be fun, I play to win nand have fun!

**Please only contact me if you fit all 9 criteria!**

My Championpool is:
{{champion:18}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:498}}      

I look forward to hearing from you!

replies.body: Welcome to the german boards. The prefered language in this section is german.
Wilkommen im deutschen Forum. Die bevorzugte Sprache in diesem Bereich ist Deutsch.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

oh sry war an die falschen Boards gepostet :D,
aber wer englisch kann kann sich trotzdem melden! :D
